imdb.title: Magic Knight Rayearth
imdb.plot: When the princess of a land ruled by the power of one's will is kidnapped by a traitorous priest, she summons three young girls from Japan to potentially fulfill the legends of the Magic Knights. Stranded upon this mysterious worl...

episodes.title: Hikaru no Negai to Puresea no Himitsu
episodes.plot: Nova appears in Hikau's heart and tells her that every hardship she has faced is all Emeraude's fault. Hikaru, attacked by Nova's words, slowly falls into the darkness within.

episodes.title: Hikaru to Hikisakareta Yujo
episodes.plot: Nova uses Hikaru's feelings towards Lantis to break Hikaru's determination. Hikaru's fears and doubts cause her to fall deeper into the darkness.

episodes.title: Hateshinai Tatakai!
episodes.plot: During the fight with Regalia, Hikaru tries reaching out to Nova who disbelieves what everyone says about Debonair while the new allies help comfort people in the castle. Lantis is trapped inside the rogue Rune God...

episodes.title: Densetsu no Majikku Naito Shido
episodes.plot: The Knights are introduced and receive their mandate, to save the land of Cephiro.

episodes.title: Nazo no Bishonen Kenshi Ferio
episodes.plot: The three girls meet an ally in their quest.

episodes.title: Inochi o Kaketa Puresea no Buki
episodes.plot: A friend is killed, and vengeance is sworn--on both sides of the battlefield.

episodes.title: Sutemi no Ferio Sabaku no Koi
episodes.plot: Trickery is used to defeat the enemy, but the best laid plans go awry.

episodes.title: Majikku Naito Saidai no Kiki
episodes.plot: A spy has entered the circle of the three Knights.

episodes.title: Yomigaeru Densetsu no Mashin Seresu
episodes.plot: The girls are closer to saving Cephiro and individual strengths are tested and strengthened.

episodes.title: Hikaru, Umi, Fu no Yuzurenai Negai
episodes.plot: A bright light has appeared, kidnapping Umi and Fuu. Hikaru remembers a map and heads toward them. She gets cut on thorns along the way. Soon after, the light goes after Hikaru, but Mokona pushes Hikaru out of the way and she falls into a ravine. She remembers that Umi and Fuu were bleeding at the time they were kidnapped. Bloody herself, she slowly reaches the top. The light comes after her again, and with her sword she kills the monster within. She retrieves Umi and Fuu and explains the monster's attraction to blood.
